snippet: Women now make up nearly half the advertising industry, yet it remains rife with sexist behavior, gender bias and pressure to be one of the guys.
abstract: Many women in advertising industry say gender bias continues to be issue for them at work, despite fact that almost 50 percent of those working in industry are women; interviews with women in advertising, some of whom are executives, reveal degree to which entrenched sexism continues to color their experiences.
lead_paragraph: Women now make up nearly half the advertising industry, yet it remains rife with sexist behavior, gender bias and pressure to be one of the guys.

headline.main: For Women in Advertising, It’s Still a ‘Mad Men’ World
